name: Mime Jr.
flavorText: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Baby Evolution
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Mr. Mime from your hand onto Mime Jr. (this counts as evolving Mime Jr.) and remove all damage counters from Mime Jr.

attacks.name: Mime
attacks.text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a number of cards equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand.
